display_long_description:
From a small team of eight plus a dog named Mal, introducing Mother Bunker VR! 

Kill zombies in VR! What else needs to be said? Step into Mother Bunker VR, where the apocalypse is a playground of endless possibilities and dangers. In this immersive VR experience, you're not just surviving; you're the architect of your destiny in a world teeming with zombies and eccentric characters.

[media]

Build Your Bunker:
Survival starts with a well-stocked bunker. Transform your hideout into a fortress. Scavenge resources from the environment (and zombies) to upgrade your bunker. All upgrades are persistent! Customize it to reflect your style and strategy.

[media]

Fight the Undead:
Engage in dynamic combat with melee tools and high-tech firearms. The low-poly aesthetic adds unique charm to intense zombie battles. Manage your weapons carefully—there’s no unlimited ammo, and your axe will lose durability after use.

Craft and Survive:
Craft food, bandages, and essentials to fight the undead. Every resource and item crafted is a step towards survival.

[media]

Why Mother Bunker VR?
-Immersive VR Experience: Unique low-poly aesthetic.
-Dynamic Combat: Intense battles with varied zombies.
-Creative Building: Upgrade and customize your bunker.

Ready to take on the apocalypse? In Mother Bunker VR, every decision matters and every encounter is a new adventure.


[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
